title: Zyloric 100MG Tab 5x10 (L)
details:
Zyloric is used in situations where the body contains too much of a material called uric acid to minimize or avoid the deposition of uric acid.

Uses

Zyloric is used in situations where the body contains too much of a material called

READ MORE
precautions: Severe rashes have been identified in patients receiving allopurinol (Hypersensitivity Syndrome, Stevens-Bohnson Syndrome, toxic epidermal necrolysis). A rash may also include mouth, ears, nose, genital ulcers, and conjunctivitis (red and swollen eyes). These severe rash are often preceded by flu, headache, and body ache symptoms (flu-like symptoms). The rash can lead to widespread bubbing and skin peeling. In Han Chinese, Thai or Korean, these severe skin reactions may be more common.In these patients, chronic kidney disease may increase the risk. Stop taking allopurinol and contact your doctor immediately if you develop a rash or symptoms of this skin.Uritic acid can increase in your urine if you have cancer or Lesch-Nyhan syndrome. You have to make sure you drink enough to dilute your urine to stop this.The kidney stones can get smaller and will reach your urinary tract if you have kidney stones.Blood dyscrasies occur more frequently than if these active substances have been administered alone with allopurinol and cytostatics (e.g., cyclophosphamide, doxorubicin, bleomycin, procarbazine, alkyl halogenides).
effects: Side EffectsNotice that this medicine has been prescribed by your doctor, who judged your benefit to be greater than the risk of side effects. Most of the people using this medicine rarely experience any significant problems, most are mild to none.Discuss to the doctor straight away if you have severe adverse reactions, including irregular Fogging, new infection symptoms (e.g., new/persistent fever, lasting sore throat), kidney disease (for example, urine changes, red/pink urine), signs of liver disease (e.g., extraordinary weakness, and other stomach issues, for example, abdominal pain and bloating.Dizziness, blurred vision, constipation, or dry mouth can be present. Inform your doctor asap if your side effects worsen.Obtain medical attention immediately if you have significant side effects such as seizures, heartbeats, excessive dizziness, or fainting.Only if you might feel discomfort, or an allergic reaction might start to happen. Such as a rash, itching/sweating, severe dizziness, and trouble breathing, you should get medical help straight away. You may have some symptoms.Immediately consult your doctor and inform them about your condition: rash, itching, swells (particularly facial/language, threat), severe dizziness, and breathing difficulties.This list of potential side effects is not complete. In case you donâ€™t significantly notice any changes or side effects that have been mentioned.This medicine is also suitable for treating bladder infections and swelling.

title: Zyloric 300MG Tab 3x10 (L)
details: It is used to treat Gout.
precautions: Use With Caution having Liver disease, Kidney disease, Diabetes, Hypertension, Fasting.
effects: Stomach upset, Nausea, Diarrhea, Drowsiness.

title: Febhil 40MG Tab 2x10 (L)
details: Febuxostat is used to lower uric acid levels in people with Gout.
precautions: During pregnancy, this medication should be used only when clearly needed. Tell your doctor/Pharmacist your medical history, especially ofCancer, Heart disease (such as Heart attack, Angina), Stroke, Liver disease, Kidney disease, Organ transplant.
effects: Nausea may occur. Febuxostat may rarely cause serious (possibly fatal) liver disease. It may also cause an increase in liver enzymes.

title: Febuxin 40MG Tab 2x10 (L)
details: Febuxostat is used to lower uric acid levels in people with Gout.
precautions: Before taking febuxostat, tell your doctor or pharmacist if you are allergic to it; or if you have any other allergies. This product may contain inactive ingredients, which can cause allergic reactions or other problems. Talk to your pharmacist for more details. Before using this medication, tell your doctor or pharmacist your medical history, especially of cancer, heart disease (such as heart attack, chest pain/angina), stroke, liver disease, kidney disease, organ transplant. Before having surgery, tell your doctor or dentist about all the products you use (including prescription drugs, nonprescription drugs, and herbal products). During pregnancy, this medication should be used only when clearly needed. Discuss the risks and benefits with your doctor.
effects: Nausea may occur. Febuxostat may rarely cause serious (possibly fatal) liver disease. It may also cause an increase in liver enzymes.

title: Colchicine 0.5MG Tab 1x100 (L)
details: Colchicine is used to prevent gout attacks (sudden, severe pain in one or more joints caused by abnormally high levels of a substance called uric acid in the blood) in adults. Colchicine (Colcrys) is also used to relieve the pain of gout attacks whe READ MORE
precautions: Before taking this medication, tell your doctor or pharmacist if you are allergic to it; or if you have any other allergies. This product may contain inactive ingredients, which can cause allergic reactions or other problems. Talk to your pharmacist for more details.
effects: Diarrhea, nausea, cramping, abdominal pain, and vomiting may occur. If any of these effects persist or worsen, tell your doctor or pharmacist promptly.

title: Gouric 40MG Tab 2x10 (L)
details:
Gouric tablet is also known as Febuxostat. It is considered the most acknowledged medicine that is specially used in the long-term to treat high uric acid levels. Most of the doctors generally recommend this medicine to use, especially if someone

READ MORE
precautions: The most important thing to consider while using this medicine is it's used while pregnancy condition because doctors does not recommend this medicine to use in such conditions as it can cause some serious side effects.Also, you should not try to use this medicine, especially if you are suffering from liver disease is because it can complement those liver diseases in the long run.
effects: As there is no doubt that this medicine can be useful and effective in treating a number of diseases, but at the same time, there are some of these serious side effects which can be extremely disastrous at times, so some of theÂ Gouric tablet side effects are given below:Nausea is considered as one of the biggest side effects of using this tablet, but it is not that serious symptom so tell your doctor if you are suffering from nausea. Always remember that this tablet provides you with greater benefits, but at the same time, there is a risk of side effects, so people using this medicine should consult with your doctor if they suffer from any kind of side effect or symptoms.The tablet also leads to liver diseases, so an increases in liver enzymes can be considered as the side effect of using this tablet, so doctors will tell you to lower your blood level and always consult with your doctor if you suffer from any kind of liver disease.The stomach pain and abdominal diseases can also be caused in the long run if you are using this medicine, so it is important to consider these conditions.

title: Zurig 40MG Tab 2x10 (L)
details:
Zurig 40 tablet is used to control uric acid levels. It belongs to the category of medicines known as antigout agents. It helps in lessening the chances of gout attacks by controlling the uric acid levels. The generic name of this medication is F

READ MORE
precautions: It is always advised to read the leaflet of the medicines before taking to know about the ingredients and substances present in the medicine. In case you are allergic to any of the inactive and active ingredients present in the medicine, do not use it.Â Patients suffering from liver dysfunction should never take this medication because it can make the situation worse. Certain substances present in this medicine are not suitable for the liver.Some people might face the problem of blurred vision after taking this medicine. In case you feel anything like that, then it is advised to not drive and take a nap.Â Patients suffering from kidney impairment should only take the medication if the doctor has prescribed it. Also, make sure to take the dosage according to the prescription and not increase or decrease on your own.Also, do not prescribe your medication to others without a doctorâ€™s consultation since this act of yours can have fatal consequences.Â Store the medicine at room temperature and keep it away from childrenâ€™s reach.During pregnancy, this medication should be used only when clearly needed. Tell your doctor/Pharmacist your medical history, especially ofCancer, Heart disease (such as Heart attack, Angina), Stroke, Liver disease, Kidney disease, Organ transplant.
effects: Every medicine has some side effects that might not affect every individual. Some people might experience mild side effects; others might experience severe side effects. Side-effects vary from person to person. A list of some of the possible side-effects caused by the use of this medication is as follows.Irritable Bowel Syndrome such as diarrhoea or constipation. Most of individuals are affected by diarrhoea.Â Severe headache along with nausea and vomiting.Mental health changes or mood swings.The appearance of rashes on the skin or dry skin.Gout flares that may wake you up.Â Â Weakness, dizziness, lethargy and agitationSwelling because of fluid retentionÂ This medicine can also disrupt the functioning of the liver in some individuals.Nausea may occur. Febuxostat may rarely cause serious (possibly fatal) liver disease. It may also cause an increase in liver enzymes.

title: Liometacen 50MG Inj 1x6 (L)
details: Indomethacin is used to relieve Pain, Swelling, and Joint stiffness caused by Arthritis, Gout, Bursitis, and Tendonitis.
precautions: Tell your doctor/Pharmacist your medical history of, Aspirin sensitive Asthma, Nasal polyps, Previous heart attack, Hypertension, Liver disease, Stomach/Intestinal/Esophagus problems such as Bleeding, Ulcers, Recurring heartburn, Stroke and hypersensitivity to active ingredients. During pregnancy, this medication should be used only when clearly needed.
effects: Upset stomach, Heartburn, Headache, Drowsiness, or Dizziness may occur.
